name: UIMotionEffect
desc: An abstract superclass for defining motion-based modifiers for views.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Initializes the motion effect to its default state.

items.name: func keyPathsAndRelativeValues(forViewerOffset: UIOffset) -> [String : Any]?
items.desc: For a given set of offset values, returns the view properties (and corresponding values) to update.
